articles.title: Doctor kills himself after taking antibiotic with 'rare link' to suicide - The Telegraph
articles.description: Coroner warns of potential ciprofloxacin risks after hearing that cardiologist had no history of mental problems
articles.content:
A retired cardiologist with no history of mental health problems took his own life one week after taking an antibiotic with a rare link to suicide, a coroner has found.
